/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The road itself is divided by a median, and a row of street lights stands sentinel along the sides, ready to illuminate the path as dusk falls. A white car can be seen in the distance, moving along the road, adding a sense of motion to the otherwise still scene. The image is a blend of urban and natural elements, a snapshot of life in a bustling city.
